entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
